title: @Carnival Knights. Who and what is the New Northern Shopkeeper?
body: Do you have any backstory to [this ](http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZI3unGQjFIc/VF4l_VDRjQI/AAAAAAAAc7k/TAT9gvDUyVE/s1600/shh.jpg)mysterious character? What race does he belong to, where does he come from?

replies.body:
Oh yeah, Otter Guy! We've had at least a dozen pet names for him, all revolving around his Otteryness. There was Otter von Bismark, Otter von Otterman, Ottersly, Ottavius, 'the shop dude,' what have you. Interestingly enough, I know more about the monsters than I do either shopkeeper. I don't even know his real name, instead defaulting to Louie-Bloo Raspberry because it's the name of the guy on the blue Otter Pop (aka the best flavor).

I honestly wish I knew, because I could put a lid on all the bad Otter puns. Sorry!

> Otter von Bismarck

â€¦awwww.

Well, now I know what *I'm* calling him. I'll add it to my list:

{{champion:81}} Mega Man
{{champion:4}} Gambit
{{champion:40}} Storm, Mistress of the Elements
{{champion:99}} Sailor Moon
{{champion:268}} *JAFFA! KREE!*
{{champion:114}} Inigo Montoya
{{champion:45}} Vivi
{{champion:16}} Twilight Sparkle
{{champion:121}} Scyther
{{champion:22}} Ashe, the Blind Archer (situational)
{{champion:126}} Tony Stark
{{champion:412}} Ghost Rider
{{champion:267}} *Part of your wooooorld*
{{champion:85}} Pikachu
{{champion:55}} Meowmeow
{{champion:76}} Meowmeow
{{champion:91}} (I've never played Assassin's Creed)
{{champion:127}} *Conceal, don't feel!*
{{champion:7}} Zatanna
{{champion:14}} (I've never played World of Warcraft)
{{champion:62}} Wukong
{{champion:238}} Shredder
{{champion:3}} *WE. ARE. GARGOYLES!*
{{champion:201}} Angus
{{champion:107}} *GET TO DAH CHOPPAH*

We may have our differences, CarnivalKnights, but if anyone can unify us, surely it must be Otter von Bismarck.
I like how {{champion:62}} is just wukong :p

Thank you for that Stargate reference :)

Man, I miss Stargate.

Oh my god. He* is* an otter...

BLUE TEAM PENTAKILL:
http://www.animalslook.com/img/cute/cute-sea-otters/cute-sea-otters14.jpg

You OTTER reconsider that notion, bro.

Also, "Strawberry Short Kook" was the best flavor.  There's no OTTER option!
you missed {{champion:57}}  I Am Oak

There was Otter von Bismark, Otter von Otterman, Ottersly, Ottavius, 'the shop dude,' what have you. Interestingly enough, I know more about the monsters than I do either shopkeeper. I don't even know his real name, instead defaulting to Louie-Bloo Raspberry because it's the name of the guy on the blue Otter Pop (aka the best flavor).

The greatest.

 Now you *have *to tell us what you know about the monsters!

he's not the original shop keeper, he's the otter shop keeper.
i'll see myself out

Just call him "WizardCrab" or "DontHassleDaHoff" and be done with it.
